snippet: What happens to paintings that are deemed forgeries? Some end up in the government’s hands, but others reappear on the walls of unsuspecting buyers.
abstract: Resale of fake paintings is a persistent and growing problem without any good solution;  there are no clear rules for what happens to phony art after it is deemed forgery, and both police and buyers have been relying mostly on art market to police itself.
lead_paragraph: What happens to paintings that are deemed forgeries? Some end up in the government’s hands, but others reappear on the walls of unsuspecting buyers.

headline.seo: With Rules Murky, Fake Artworks Stay on the Market
headline.main: Fake Art May Keep Popping Up for Sale
headline.print_headline: Fake Art May Keep Popping Up for Sale
